headline: Dollar General (DG): Valuation Insights Following Raised Outlook and Strong Quarterly Growth
summary: If you have been watching Dollar General (DG) lately, you are not alone. The company just reported another quarter of growth, beating last year’s sales and earnings numbers while raising its full-year guidance for both revenue and profit. That combination of delivering results and sounding a more optimistic note for the coming months is exactly the sort of event that gets investors talking. Depending on your outlook, this either encourages reaching for wallets or wondering if the run might be...
